item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Item AS DebitItem, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountReceiptTurnover AS AmountReceipt, 0 AS AmountReceiptFact FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssetsForecast.Turnovers(, , Auto, PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers WHERE CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountReceiptTurnover <> 0

item.name: DataSet4
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item AS DebitItem, SUM(CashAssets.Amount) AS AmountReceiptFact, 0 AS AmountReceipt FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.Amount > 0 AND CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod
GROUP BY CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item

item.name: DataSet2
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover, AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalanceFact, 0 AS AmountTurnoverFact, 0 AS AmountClosingBalanceFact FROM AccountingRegister.Managerial.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Auto, , Account.TypeOfAccount = VALUE(Enum.GLAccountsTypes.CashAssets), PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS AdministrativeBalanceAndTurnovers

item.name: DataSet5
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountOpeningBalance AS AmountOpeningBalanceFact, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountTurnover AS AmountTurnoverFact, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountClosingBalance AS AmountClosingBalanceFact, 0 AS AmountOpeningBalance, 0 AS AmountTurnover, 0 AS AmountClosingBalance FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets.BalanceAndTurnovers(, , Period, RegisterRecords, ) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers

item.name: DataSet3
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Company, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.Item AS ExpenseItem, CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover AS AmountExpense, 0 AS AmountExpenseFact FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssetsForecast.Turnovers(, , Auto, PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers WHERE CashAssetsBalanceAndTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover <> 0

item.name: DataSet6
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item AS ExpenseItem, SUM(CashAssets.Amount) AS AmountExpenseFact, 0 AS AmountExpense FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.Amount > 0 AND CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod
GROUP BY CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.Item

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(AmountClosingBalance) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountClosingBalance) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountClosingBalanceFact), 0) - ISNULL ( SUM(AmountClosingBalance) , 0) ) * 100 / ISNULL ( SUM(AmountClosingBalance) , 0) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountOpeningBalance) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountOpeningBalance) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountOpeningBalanceFact), 0) - ISNULL ( SUM(AmountOpeningBalance) , 0) ) * 100 / ISNULL ( SUM(AmountOpeningBalance) , 0) END
CASE WHEN SUM(AmountTurnover)IS NULL OR SUM(AmountTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountTurnoverFact), 0) - ISNULL ( SUM(AmountTurnover) , 0) ) * 100 / ISNULL ( SUM(AmountTurnover) , 0) END
CASE WHEN SUM(AmountReceipt)IS NULL OR SUM(AmountReceipt) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountReceiptFact), 0) - ISNULL ( SUM(AmountReceipt) , 0) ) * 100 / ISNULL ( SUM(AmountReceipt) , 0) END
CASE WHEN SUM(AmountExpense)IS NULL OR SUM(AmountExpense) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountExpenseFact), 0) - ISNULL ( SUM(AmountExpense) , 0) ) * 100 / ISNULL ( SUM(AmountExpense) , 0) END

parameter.name: PlanningPeriod
parameter.expression: CASE WHEN &PlanningPeriodUser = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef) THEN VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.Actual) ELSE &PlanningPeriodUser END

v8:item.v8:content: Funds as of the period start
Funds as of the period end
Funds as of the period end
Funds as of the period start
